name: Sarv Daliya Manav Vikas Kendra
briefDescription: NGO RUNNING FROM 1975. PROJECTS IMPLEMENTS FINANCIAL ASSISTANT BY STATE AND CENTRAL GOVERNMENT OF INDIA. NGO WORKS FOR RURAL DEVELOPMENT,WOMEN & CHILD DEVELOPMENT, HEALTH, EDUCATION ,VOCATIONAL TRAINING, EMPLOYMENT, ENVIRONMENT,SOCIAL ECO DEVELOPMENT, CRASH, ADULT EDUCATION, NON FORMAL EDUCATION, CONDENSE COURSE. ABOUT THOUSANDS PEOPLE SERVED IN THIS PROJECTS.
